month.description: Please fill the fields below based on the values displayed on your payslip, wherever applicable.

isResident.label: Are you a resident in Mauritius?

isPublicSector.label: Do you work in the public sector?

isPRB.label: Do you fall under the PRB's scope?

isInDomesticService.label: Do you work in the domestic service sector?

chargeableIncome.subtitle: Chargeable income (amount on which your PAYE tax is calculated)

incomeDescription.travelingAllowance: Traveling allowance (amount your employer pays you)
incomeDescription.maxNonTaxableTravelingAllowance: Maximum non-taxable traveling allowance = 25% x Base salary (up to {{maxAllowance}})
incomeDescription.taxableTravelingAllowance: Taxable traveling allowance (applicable if the traveling allowance exceeds the maximum non-taxable traveling allowance)

paye.subtitle: PAYE (rounded off value) charged by the MRA (displayed on payslip)
paye.calculationDescription: PAYE is calculated as follows. On each row,
paye.calculationSteps:
• if the remaining chargeable income is less than the taxable limit, the remaining chargeable income is used as the taxable amount
  • otherwise, the taxable limit is used as the taxable amount and the taxable limit is subtracted from the remaining chargeable income for the next row's calculation<

csg.subtitle: CSG (rounded off value) charged by the MRA (displayed on payslip)

nsf.subtitle: NSF (rounded off value) charged by the MRA (displayed on payslip)
nsf.nsfInsurableSalaryExplanation: NSF is calculated on the base salary. However, only part of the basic salary is used in the calculation, i.e. <Link>a minimum & a maximum set by the MRA</Link> (page 9).

fsc.subtitle: Fair Share Contribution (rounded off value) charged by the MRA (displayed on payslip)
fsc.fscChargeableIncomeExplanation: Fair Share Contribution is only applicable if it's over Rs {{maxFSCNonTaxableLimit}}.

incomeAfterTaxes.subtitle: Income received after tax deduction (rounded off value)

description.totalTaxes: PAYE + CSG + NSF + Fair Share Contribution

year.description: For any expense you have incurred partly or completely for the financial year, please fill in the corresponding field below based on the amount you have paid, not your employer. Check out MRA's website (exempt income and reliefs, deductions & allowances) for more information.

monthlyBaseSalary.label: Monthly base salary (for 1 month)
monthlyBaseSalary.description: The monthly base salary for a full month's work.

totalBaseSalary.label: Total base salary (for 12 months)
totalBaseSalary.description: Calculate the total base salary for the financial year.

eoyBonus.label: EOY Bonus
eoyBonus.description: This is known as the 13th month bonus.

travelingAllowance.label: Traveling allowance
travelingAllowance.description: Calculate the total traveling allowance for the financial year.

performanceBonus.label: Performance bonus
performanceBonus.description: Calculate the total performance bonus for the financial year.

otherTaxableIncome.label: Other taxable income
otherTaxableIncome.description: Calculate the total of other taxable income for the financial year.

otherTaxDeductions.label: Tax deductions
otherTaxDeductions.description: Calculate the total of tax deductions for the financial year.
